title: Chistiy Vkus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, International, Delivery, Take-out, Turkish
description: A vegetarian cafe, opened November 2013, offers dishes from different countries but Russian and Indian veganized cuisine is featured. Vegan items comprise more than half of the menu, including cauliflower with peas and herbs, subji with steamed asparagus, malai kofta, lentil burgers and pumpkin cream soup, Turkish salad with couscous, pizza with tofu and chocolate cake. A large selection of teas are available. At certain times has live music, cultural events. Delivery within the city. Free Wi-Fi. No smoking allowed and no alcohol served, Name in English: Pure Taste. Moved from Sudostroitelnaya in June 2014.
